question: Question_02_(a)
statement:
\textbf{Short-Answer Question. Simplify your answer as much as possible
and show your work.}

Find an equation of the tangent line to the curve
$\displaystyle y = e^{\sin x} + x$ at the point \emph{(0,1)}.
hints:
Try calculating $y'(0)$, i.e., $\left.\frac{dy}{dx}\right|_{x=0}$ to
find the slope of the tangent line.

Recall that the equation of the line tangent to the graph of $y = f(x)$
at $(a, f(a))$ is $y = f'(a)(x-a) + f(a)$.
